005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.DocumentFunctionException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.util.List;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Implements the XPath 3.1
029 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc">fn:doc</a>
030 * function.
031 */
032public final class FnDoc {
033  private static final String NAME = "doc";
034  @NonNull
035  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
036      .name(NAME)
037      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
038      .deterministic()
039      .contextDependent()
040      .focusIndependent()
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("arg1")
043          .type(IStringItem.class)
044          .zeroOrOne()
045          .build())
046      .returnType(IDocumentNodeItem.class)
047      .returnOne()
048      .functionHandler(FnDoc::execute)
049      .build();
050
051  private FnDoc() {
052    // disable construction
053  }
054
055  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
056  @NonNull
057  private static ISequence<IDocumentNodeItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
058      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
059      IItem focus) {
060    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
061
062    IStringItem item = arg.getFirstItem(true);
063
064    return item == null ? ISequence.empty() : ISequence.of(fnDoc(item, dynamicContext));
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Dynamically load the document associated with the URI, and return a
069   * {@link IDocumentNodeItem} containing the result.
070   * <p>
071   * Based on the XPath 3.1
072   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc">fn:doc</a>
073   * function.
074   *
075   * @param documentUri
076   *          the resource to load the data from
077   * @param context
078   *          the Metapath dynamic context
079   * @return the loaded document node item
080   */
081  public static IDocumentNodeItem fnDoc(@NonNull IStringItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
082    IAnyUriItem uri;
083    try {
084      uri = IAnyUriItem.cast(documentUri);
085    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
086      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT,
087          String.format("Invalid URI argument '%s' to fn:doc or fn:doc-available.", documentUri.asString()), ex);
088    }
089
090    return fnDoc(uri, context);
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Dynamically load the document associated with the URI, and return a
095   * {@link IDocumentNodeItem} containing the result.
096   * <p>
097   * Based on the XPath 3.1
098   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-doc">fn:doc</a>
099   * function.
100   *
101   * @param documentUri
102   *          the resource to load the data from
103   * @param context
104   *          the Metapath dynamic context
105   * @return the loaded document node item
106   */
107  public static IDocumentNodeItem fnDoc(@NonNull IAnyUriItem documentUri, @NonNull DynamicContext context) {
108    // resolve if possible
109    IAnyUriItem uri = FnResolveUri.fnResolveUri(documentUri, null, context);
110    if (!uri.isAbsolute() && !uri.isOpaque()) {
111      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
112          .format("No base-uri is available in the static context to resolve the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()));
113    }
114
115    try {
116      return context.getDocumentLoader().loadAsNodeItem(ObjectUtils.notNull(uri.asUri()));
117    } catch (IOException ex) {
118      throw new DocumentFunctionException(DocumentFunctionException.ERROR_RETRIEVING_RESOURCE, String
119          .format("Unable to retrieve the resource identified by the URI '%s'.", documentUri.toString()), ex);
120    }
121  }
122}
